title: Antibody could increase cure rate for blood, immune disorders

title_detail.value: Antibody could increase cure rate for blood, immune disorders

summary: An antibody-based treatment can gently and effectively eliminate diseased blood-forming stem cells in the bone marrow to prepare for the transplantation of healthy stem cells, according to a study in mice.

summary_detail.value: An antibody-based treatment can gently and effectively eliminate diseased blood-forming stem cells in the bone marrow to prepare for the transplantation of healthy stem cells, according to a study in mice.
